item.description:
Full Moon Chakra Meditation & Wellness Night with Bret Duback

Kundalini Yoga with Brett Duback, 5-6 pm
($5 class)
The Kundalini is untapped energy (prana) at the base of the spine that can be drawn up through the body awakening each of the seven chakras. Kundalini Yoga posturess are done in conjunction with a specific breath that intensifies the effects of the poses with the purpose of freeing energy in the lower body and allowing it to move upwards.

Organic Soup & Salad and selection of herbal teas provided by Alchemy, 6-7 pm ($10 per dinner)
Come experience delicious evening and be a part of our Community Dinner tradition. Alchemy Cafe will create a seasonal organic dinner featuring greens and goodness!

DJ Kirtan – A Chakra Meditation through Music….journey through the seven centers, 7-10 pm ($10 class)
Kirtan can carry us effortlessly to a place of quiet, to stillness. One of the oldest sacred music traditions of the world, the kirtan call-and-response chanting genre comes to us from India. Using ancient Sanskrit mantras, the kirtan calls upon sacred energies which serve to quiet the mind, remove obstacles, and bring us back to the center of our being.

Pay individually for each event, or make a $20 donation for the entire evening and become a member of the Green Vibration! Memberships include discounts for the Growing Green Wellness Center's fitness classes, sauna and healing treatments. All members will receive a 10% discount on their next event and a free sauna session! To learn more about monthly memberships, please visit www.GrowingGreenEvents.com/Join-Our-Community.


Please see www.GrowingGreenEvents.com/Calandar for more information about our upcoming events in February!
item.name: Full Moon Chakra Meditation & Wellness Night
